techmeme.title: Google's AI Mode, its chatbot for Search, rolls out to everyone in the US and will include features like Deep Search, agentic capabilities, and chart generation (Igor Bonifacic/Engadget)
Google announces Video Overviews is coming soon to NotebookLM, to turn dense multimedia, like raw notes, PDFs, and images, into digestible visual presentations (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
Google debuts Deep Think, an enhanced reasoning mode in Gemini 2.5 Pro that it says excels at math and coding, available to "trusted testers" via the Gemini API (Taryn Plumb/VentureBeat)
Google says it is partnering with Samsung, Gentle Monster, Xreal, and Warby Parker to create Android XR smart glasses, offering AI assistance via Gemini (Victoria Song/The Verge)
Google rolls out Project Mariner, its web-browsing AI agent, to Google's AI Ultra plan, and brings its capabilities to the Gemini API and Vertex AI (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
